title: #365: Mother Of All Truth Bombs Live From The Comedy Store #4 with Greg Carlwood and Geno Bisconte
description:
Thank you so much for tuning in for the 4th Mother Of All Truth Bombs live stream at the World Famous Comedy Store. This episode I welcome the OG of Conspiracies Greg Carlwood and Compound Media's Geno Bisconte to the show to discuss the world of Conspiracies. Thank you for your support.

See Sam Tripoli Live:
Raleigh North Carolina: Sept 24-26 Goodnight Comedy Club:
www.goodnightscomedy.com/

St. Louis, Missouri: Oct 1st-3rd: Headlining the St. Louis Helium Comedy Club:
st-louis.heliumcomedy.com

Thank you to our sponsors:
CBDLion.com: With a wide variety of award winning CBD products, they are sure there is product for every consumer out there. Maybe you like to vape your CBD, or your old fashioned and like a dropper full of tincture oil under your tongue, maybe your just are looking for a topical, they have lotions, kinesiology sports tape and bath bombs. Try the vegan organic CBD gummies. You can find products that are isolate based, broad spectrum and full spectrum. For all the Tin Foil Hat listeners goto CBDLion.com and type the word "Tinfoil" to 20% off for every order.

Skrewballwhiskey.com: Skrewball, the original and most awarded, peanut butter whiskey, is now available near you. At seventy proof, enjoy it neat, on the rocks, or in your favorite cocktail. Pick up Skrewball at your local store or get it delivered today. Go to skrewballwhiskey.com for more info and click on buy now. Please drink responsibly.

MyBookie: Winning season returns to MyBookie which means double your first deposit, Survivor, Supercontests and Squares! From live betting to championship futures, every ply you want to make is waiting for your at MyBookie! Go too Mybookie.com invest in your intuition. Use the promo code "TINFOILHAT" and double your first deposit, new players get up to $1000 in Free Play

Manscaped: Get 20% Off and Free Shipping with the code TINFOILHAT at Manscaped.com. That’s 20% off with free shipping at manscaped.com, and use code TINFOILHAT

MackWeldon.com: Mack Weldon is a premium men’s essentials brand that believes in smart design and premium fabrics. Mack Weldon will be the most comfortable underwear, socks, shirts, undershirts, hoodies and sweatpants and more that you will ever wear. Mack Weldon have even created their own totally free, loyalty program called Weldon Blue. Level 1 gets you free shipping for life. And once you reach Level 2 by spending $200, Mack Weldon will start giving you 20% off every order for the next year! Here is a the special offer from Mack Weldon for the Swarm.... 20% off your first order, visit mackweldon.com/tinfoil AND ENTER PROMO CODE: tinfoil

Blue Chew: Visit Blue Chew dot com and get your first shipment free when you use promo code tinfoil. Just pay $5 shipping. That’s B-L-U-E-Chew dot com promo code tinfoil. Chew it and do it!
